content: throughout october and november wearing a scarlet poppy is a sign of remembrance in the uk tying in with remembrance sunday on 9 november it s particularly poignant this year as august 2014 saw the ww1 centenary the 100th anniversary of britain entering the conflict to mark this we ve shared this free pattern from issue 24 to help all those crocheting poppies to raise money for the royal british legion this year
